effect.black_white: The target will act next this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority. If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.
effect.black_2_white_2: The target will act next this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority. If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.

short_effect.black_white: Makes the target act next this turn.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Makes the target act next this turn.

flavor_text.black_white: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
